title: Licensure required
context: [ยง451K-4] Licensure required. No individual shall purport to be a licensed genetic counselor or use the letters &ldquo;L.G.C.&rdquo; in connection with the individual&rsquo;s name, or use any words or symbols indicating or tending to indicate that the individual is a licensed genetic counselor without meeting the applicable requirements and holding a license as set forth in this chapter. [L 2009, c 191, pt of ยง2]
